title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast - Feb 21 2020
itunes:title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast - Feb 21 2020
description:
PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 1:

Media goes right back to Russia! Democrat voters love Crazy Bernie. Trump voters on line to see Trump in Vegas. Crazy Bernie is a communist, why would Putin want Trump? Media montage: Russia interfering in election to help Trump. The Deep State and WMD in Iraq. Stone sentencing led up to NYT story. Enjoy the insanity of the Democrat implosion. CNN’s John King: Nobody saying Trump is colluding with Russia AGAIN. He never did! Democrats believe every syllable of the Russia hoax. Trump Colorado rally data scares the heck out of Democrats, their voters are moving to Trump. Trump holding Mini Mike meme. Brennan and Clapper. Cold front moves through Florida. Plans for Limbaugh Museum of Broadcasting. Cheating in baseball is nothing new.

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 2:

Did Bobby Thomson have the signs in 1951 when he hit the Shot Heard 'Round the World? Rush tells videotaping story from Kansas City Royals days. Stealing signs is nothing new in baseball. Democrats want to make America suck again. Female minority business owner says Democrats look down on her. What is Rush’s true Talent on Loan from God? Clyburn: Black employment numbers were better during slavery than under Trump. The Russians don’t want Trump reelected.

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 3:

Bloomberg is the only Democrat with the money and the will to stay in long enough to deny Crazy Bernie. Biden is done. It may not be Mayor Pete’s year. Verdict reached in Weinstein trial. Bloomberg paying people to like him on social media. Stand Up for Betsy Ross. 11-year-old girl named Trump gets teased in Philadelphia, but was at home in Texas. What did it feel like when Rush earned his first million?

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
